markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wild Empathy](/Feats.aspx?ID=499) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 172 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetypes** [Beastmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=50) (Level 4), [Mammoth Lord](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=170) (Level 4)

</column>

---

You have a connection to the creatures of the natural world that allows you to communicate with them on a rudimentary level. You can use Diplomacy to Make an Impression on animals and to make very simple Requests of them. In most cases, wild animals will give you time to make your case.
name: Wild Empathy
